name: Angry Turds
description:
This is a 1 level demo for the game Angry Turds specifically created as a proof of concept for the shitstarter campaign.

This does not necessarily represent the final product as this game is very much in development.

There will be a plan to eventually release it on mobile as well as pc.

I hope you have enjoyed this demo and if you can donate to the kickstarter that would be amazing. I very much think this game could be very fun especially when played on the toilet and with the addition of a few more game mechanics.

You can use the left and right key to move the cannon and you can use the space button to fire.

or

You can use the mouse pointer and left mouse button to physically move the cannon with the mouse and use the right mouse button to fire the cannon
